additionalInformation: Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources. Increases most heroes' magic resistance to 40%. With the magic resistance bonus from this source, every 10 points of intelligence further increases the total magic resistance by 0.8%. [?]

name: Cloak
description: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
trivia: In the original DotA, this item was known as Planewalker's Cloak. Before Planewalker's Cloak, this item was named "Cloak of the Magus" and before that, it was named "Magus' Cloak".
